input_text:
Job Title: Superintendent

Location: Dallas-Fort Worth Metroplex

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Project Management

Description:
Join a leading Multifamily real estate developer and builder, renowned for over 35 years for designing exceptional communities with best-in-class homes and amenities.
About: My client prioritizes integrity, respect, and commitment in everything. Their team is dedicated to data-driven management and continuous improvement, ensuring exceptional multifamily communities with the best risk-adjusted returns.
Position: SuperintendentLocation: Dallas
Responsibilities:Clearly, and constructively, communicate to all project team members, as listed above, while maintaining all appropriate documentation of conversations.Assist PM with OAC meetingsEffectively communicate with the PM any issues arising with cost implications or schedule delaysEnsure the project meets or exceeds expectations by consistently monitoring safety, scheduling, quality control, and all applicable code requirements in accordance with plans and clarifications.Superintendent will be responsible to develop and implement a program to ensure timely delivery of materials to meet the project timelines and requirements.
Why Join?Culture of Excellence: Be part of a team that prioritizes integrity, respect, and commitment, where every member contributes to creating exceptional communities with best-in-class homes and amenities.Professional Growth: Enjoy meaningful opportunities for professional development and advancement, with ongoing investment in your skills and career trajectory.Industry Recognition: Join an organization that has been recognized as a leader in Multifamily real estate development, with notable accolades such as being the fastest-growing developer and builder in the industry.Comprehensive Benefits: Take advantage of a comprehensive benefits package, including competitive salaries, bonus programs, generous PTO, healthcare options, 401(k) with company match, and more.Impactful Work: Make a lasting impact on the communities where we build, and be part of a team that is committed to "Building What Matters" and leaving a positive legacy.
"How Do I Apply”Apply here, or reach out to me via email (trey.feraco@metric-search.com) if interested, then we’ll have a chat so I can go into more detail and you can see how amazing this opportunity is to join such a successful company!

Experience Level (if available): Associate

output_json.title: Superintendent
output_json.summary: Join a leading Multifamily real estate developer and builder.

Effectively communicate with the PM any issues arising with cost implications or schedule delays
Ensure the project meets or exceeds expectations by consistently monitoring safety, scheduling, quality control, and all applicable code requirements in accordance with plans and clarifications
Superintendent will be responsible to develop and implement a program to ensure timely delivery of materials to meet the project timelines and requirements
